transcript:
[[A boy sits in a barrel which is floating in an ocean.]]
Boy: I wonder where I'll float next?
[[The barrel drifts into the distance. Nothing else can be seen.]]
{{Alt: Don't we all.}}
title: Barrel - Part 1

transcript:
[[Two trees are growing on opposite sides of a sphere.]]
{{Alt-title: 'Petit' being a reference to Le Petit Prince, which I only thought about halfway through the sketch}}
alt: 'Petit' being a reference to Le Petit Prince, which I only thought about halfway through the sketch
title: Petit Trees (sketch)
